name: Apsara
description:
Concept originally was to create a bold futuristic character with combination of Indian culture as well as modern design . But as the project progressed I thought to capture the essence of ethereal grace character should be more tradional and mythology so keeping same characteristics in mind I continued with conceptualization

This was my first time trying to make a 3D project and the progress was done in 2 days . Therefore project is incomplete . But these are few of the concepts I was able to make
